name: Metal cutting sim
description:
this is my last game for now I transported my files to my real computer I was making these games on my school laptop and it is the day where they collect the laptops for the year and this site is blocked on its wifi but I might be able to still make games because the app is unblocked so the end for now. This is my last time uploading a game a home so check out my constuct 3 page https://www.construct.net/en/free-online-games/profile/slideshowgames-inc-110212... 

instructions 

tap or click the laser to turn it off and press one of the  buttons to turn it on
